title: 2015 Ford Transit
item_description:

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received, please allow 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
